Class RunnableNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.NodeImp
      • org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.RunnableNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeListener, Node, RunnableNodeInterface

    public class RunnableNode
extends NodeImp
implements RunnableNodeInterface
    A NodeCable which has run-time parameters.
